therapeuticGoals.title: Shadow Integration
therapeuticGoals.description: Guide clients to recognize, accept, and integrate shadow aspects that have been rejected or disowned
approaches: Help identify projection patterns in relationships
Facilitate dialogue with shadow elements through storytelling
Connect shadow aspects to their protective origins
Transform shadow energy into constructive expression

therapeuticGoals.title: Five Minds Balance
therapeuticGoals.description: Develop greater equilibrium among the five minds, reducing dominance of thinker, judge, and commentator
approaches: Strengthen observer mind through contemplative practices
Identify which mind dominates in different situations
Teach recognition of mind patterns without identification
Develop capacity to consciously choose which mind to engage

therapeuticGoals.title: Dimensional Harmony
therapeuticGoals.description: Foster integration and balance across all five dimensions of human experience
approaches: Assess current state of each dimension
Identify overdeveloped and underdeveloped dimensions
Create practices to strengthen neglected dimensions
Develop awareness of how dimensions interact and influence each other

therapeuticGoals.title: Journey Progression
therapeuticGoals.description: Support movement through appropriate Hero's Journey stages with proper preparation and integration
approaches: Accurately identify current journey stage
Provide stage-appropriate challenges and support
Ensure sufficient integration before advancing to next stage
Recognize when cycling through stages is necessary

therapeuticGoals.title: Mentor Relationship
therapeuticGoals.description: Establish effective therapeutic alliance based on mythological mentor-hero dynamic
approaches: Model appropriate mentor qualities without fostering dependency
Provide guidance while honoring client's autonomy
Offer tools and wisdom appropriate to journey stage
Prepare client to eventually become mentor to others

therapeuticGoals.title: Synchronicity Awareness
therapeuticGoals.description: Develop client's capacity to recognize and work with meaningful coincidences
approaches: Teach recognition of synchronistic patterns
Explore symbolic meaning of coincidental events
Connect synchronicities to journey stages and challenges
Use synchronicity as guidance for decision-making

therapeuticGoals.title: Rock Transformation
therapeuticGoals.description: Help client identify and transform primary obstacles ('rocks') into resources
approaches: Facilitate clear identification of core challenges
Explore how rocks developed as protection
Discover gifts and strengths hidden within obstacles
Create practical strategies to transform limitations

therapeuticGoals.title: Inner Work Commitment
therapeuticGoals.description: Foster dedication to consistent contemplative practice and self-reflection
approaches: Establish regular 'silence' practice
Develop journaling or reflection rituals
Create accountability for inner work between sessions
Connect inner practice to outer transformation

therapeuticGoals.title: Elixir Development
therapeuticGoals.description: Help client identify and share the unique gifts emerging from their journey
approaches: Recognize wisdom gained through challenges
Articulate insights in communicable form
Find appropriate ways to share transformation with others
Develop service orientation from personal healing

clientSpecificGoals.title: Self-Compassion Development
clientSpecificGoals.description: Cultivate kinder relationship with self, particularly when facing challenges
clientSpecificGoals.currentState: Judge mind dominates with harsh self-criticism
clientSpecificGoals.desiredState: Balanced perspective with self-acceptance during difficulties

clientSpecificGoals.title: Emotional Regulation
clientSpecificGoals.description: Develop greater capacity to navigate difficult emotions without avoidance
clientSpecificGoals.currentState: Tendency to suppress or intellectualize emotional experiences
clientSpecificGoals.desiredState: Ability to witness, name, and process emotions with resilience

clientSpecificGoals.title: Purpose Clarification
clientSpecificGoals.description: Discover deeper meaning and direction for current life chapter
clientSpecificGoals.currentState: Sense of disconnection from meaningful purpose
clientSpecificGoals.desiredState: Clear sense of purpose that aligns actions with core values

clientSpecificGoals.title: Relationship Pattern Transformation
clientSpecificGoals.description: Identify and shift recurring challenges in close relationships
clientSpecificGoals.currentState: Repeating patterns of conflict and disconnection
clientSpecificGoals.desiredState: More authentic and fulfilling connections with others

clientSpecificGoals.title: Professional Alignment
clientSpecificGoals.description: Bring career path into greater harmony with authentic self
clientSpecificGoals.currentState: Work feels disconnected from deeper values and strengths
clientSpecificGoals.desiredState: Professional expression that reflects true purpose and gifts
